name: Induction Cooktop, Range & Oven Rebate
description: Up to $750 rebate for replacing gas with induction range; income-qualified customers may receive up to $950; cooktop and wall oven replacements also available
fullDescription: Silicon Valley Power offers rebates for Santa Clara residents switching from gas to induction cooking, with enhanced rebates for income-qualified customers.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $750 rebate for induction range
- Up to $950 for income-qualified customers
- Covers induction cooktops
- Covers induction ranges
- Covers wall ovens
- Must replace gas cooking equipment
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Silicon Valley Power customer
2. Replace gas cooking equipment with induction
3. Purchase qualifying induction cooktop/range/oven
4. Apply online through SVP rebate platform
5. Submit proof of purchase and installation
6. Income-qualified submit additional documentation
keywords: Silicon Valley Power, SVP, induction, cooktop, range, oven, Santa Clara, $750, $950, gas replacement, electric cooking
